Name: trichotillomania
Definition: An impulse control disorder that involves the uncontrollable plucking of ones hair.

Name: pathological gambling
Definition: An impulse control disorder that involves the uncontrollable impulse to gamble

Name: kleptomania
Definition: An impulse control disorder that involves the repeated impulse to steal for no great gain

Name: intermittent explosive disorder
Definition: An impulse control disorder that involves the episodic inability to control violent impulses with a disproportionate degree of aggressiveness.

Name: pyromania
Definition: An impulse control disorder that involves the uncontrollable impulse to repeatedly set fires with no obvious motive.

Name: Kluver-Bucy syndrome
Definition: An impulse control disorder that involves abnormalities in memory
